meanings.definition: To drink (alcoholic beverages) frequently or habitually.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys bibbing cocktails with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He was bibbing beer at the bar last night.
meanings.sent3: The cat was caught bibbing milk from the neighbor's porch.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to be bibbing up the rainwater as it flowed swiftly downstream.
meanings.sent5: The toddler was bibbing juice from his sippy cup with great enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking (alcoholic beverages) frequently or habitually.
meanings.sent1: His bibbing of whiskey led to some concerning behavior.
meanings.sent2: The bibbing at the party lasted until the early hours of the morning.
meanings.sent3: The bibbing contest at the pub was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The city's bibbing of champagne to celebrate the new year was extravagant.
meanings.sent5: The bibbing of wine at the vineyard tour left everyone in high spirits.
